definitions.example: Have you looked at the overnights yet?

definitions.definition: An overnight stay, especially in a hotel or other lodging facility.
(in the plural) Viewership ratings for a television show that are published the morning after it is broadcast, and may be revised later on.
The fore part of the previous night; yesterday evening.
To stay overnight; to spend the night.
To send something for delivery the next day.
definitions.example: We can overnight you the documents for signature.

definitions.definition: Of an activity or event in which participants stay overnight.
definitions.example: They sent their kids to overnight camp.

definitions.definition: During or throughout the night, especially during the evening or night just past.
definitions.example: Let it run overnight and we'll check on it in the morning.

definitions.definition: In a very short (but unspecified) amount of time.
definitions.example: The change seemed to happen overnight.
